name: After the Storm (Dcash)
description: Uploaded as a submission to Week 101 of the Weekly Game Jam.  This is the first game jam I've participated, and probably the most developed game I've made. The object of the game is to reach the end tile, which is placed at the lowest point in the terrain. Avoid the water, and try to get to the end before the water starts rising. If you have any feedback, please comment.
